desc: Updates the connection status between a user and an app.

token.desc: Authentication token bearing required scopes. Tokens should be passed as an HTTP Authorization header or alternatively, as a POST parameter.

user_id.desc: The ID of the user for the status update.

status.desc: The status that should be set for the user.

invalid_auth.desc: The token doesn't have access to this endpoint.

app_not_subscribed.desc: The app is not subscribed to the required events.
